overview: Winny joined Sparqlight as co-founder in 2011, handling operations and day-to-day business management. At The Enterprise University, she built and managed strategic accounts, including state and federal agencies. Prior to The Enterprise University, Winny was the Director of Sales Operations at Apex Voice Communications, where she helped the sales team grow the business from startup to a global telecom player. Winny is active in Human Resources, Training, and Technology communities. As a member of TechAmericaâ€™s Executive Committee in Los Angeles, she is actively involved with the Executive Roundtables. She has a special interest in promoting innovation, STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, & Math) education, and workforce competitiveness. Winny earned her degree in Economics from the University of California, Berkeley.
